Package net.sf.appia.protocols.group

Appia Group Communication Layers and Sessions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AppiaBitSet  
ArrayOptimized Title: Description:
Endpt Endpt represents a group member, endpoint.
EventBuffer An Event buffer.
Group Group is a group identifier.
LocalState Local values corresponding to the current ViewState.
ViewID The unique identifier of a ViewState.
ViewState A view.
 

Exception Summary
AppiaGroupException Superclass of all exceptions thrown by Appias Group Communication protocols.
 

Error Summary
AppiaGroupError Superclass of all errors thrown by Appias GroupCommunication protocols.
 

Package net.sf.appia.protocols.group Description

Appia Group Communication Layers and Sessions.
This package contains all the components required to support Group Communication, and associated services.
